headline: Nuclear Stocks Sell Off After U.S. Army Launches Microreactor Program
summary: Analysts warn the nuclear sector may be overheating, as investor enthusiasm has driven up valuations of early-stage firms like Oklo and NuScale with little or no revenue

headline: ARCLIGHT ANNOUNCES SARA GRAZIANO JOINS AS A PARTNER ON THE INVESTMENT TEAM
summary: ArcLight Capital Partners ("ArcLight"), a leading infrastructure investor, today announced that Sara Graziano has joined ArcLight as a Partner, building upon its significant resources and capabilities of providing and investing in customized, large scale electric infrastructure solutions for utilities, hyperscalers, and data center developers. Graziano brings over 20 years of industry and investment experience to ArcLight across the power, battery storage, renewable, and energy environmental sec

headline: Capacity Bridges Agent Guidance and Automation Gap with Creovai Acquisition
summary: Capacity, the AI-powered support automation platform for Contact Centers, today announced the acquisition of Creovai, a leader in real-time agent assist and automated quality assurance solutions. The acquisition strengthens Capacity's conversation intelligence capabilities, providing clients with a unified platform for optimizing both virtual and live agent interactions.
